sources.title: The Oval Portrait (1973)
sources.description: A woman finds herself possessed by the soul of another woman trapped inside a painting. Based on a work by Edgar Allan Poe, aka The Oval Portrait. Watch on RetroFlix:  https://retroflix.org/the-oval-portrait-1973/

sources.title: The Oval Portrait (1972) GOTHIC HORROR
sources.description: A woman finds herself possessed by the soul of another woman trapped inside a painting.

metadata.Plot: A woman finds herself possessed by the soul of another woman trapped inside a painting.
metadata.Writer: Enrique Torres Tudela, Edgar Allan Poe
metadata.Actors: Wanda Hendrix, Barry Coe, Gisele MacKenzie
